content:
flipchan opened Issue #1806:

Please update bumpalo since version less then 3.2.1 is unstable

https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/blob/a76639c6fb65b3c8427a9f382443fe3b56fd17d1/cranelift/peepmatic/crates/runtime/Cargo.toml

Links:
https://rust.firosolutions.com/paste/e4Q9jYY3eHoSxVUlpIc2Mmzj9RvhwxZ9SGngoQLR4
https://rustsec.org/advisories/RUSTSEC-2020-0006.html

bjorn3 commented on Issue #1806:

bumpalo 3.2.1 is semver compatible with the required bumpalo 3.2.0, so just updating the Cargo.lock of the user of Cranelift will be enough to use bumpalo 3.2.1 or later. The Cargo.lock of Wasmtime already specifies bumpalo 3.4.0.

alexcrichton commented on Issue #1806:

Thanks for the reported, but as @bjorn3 mentioned we should be covered here. Projects using wasmtime will pull in the latest bumpalo and we're already using a fixed version too.

alexcrichton closed Issue #1806:

Please update bumpalo since version less then 3.2.1 is unstable

https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/blob/a76639c6fb65b3c8427a9f382443fe3b56fd17d1/cranelift/peepmatic/crates/runtime/Cargo.toml

Links:
https://rust.firosolutions.com/paste/e4Q9jYY3eHoSxVUlpIc2Mmzj9RvhwxZ9SGngoQLR4
https://rustsec.org/advisories/RUSTSEC-2020-0006.html
